name: Ghost Warrior
description:
Foot slips under the floor, pay attention to the ghost, scary obstacles are everywhere to prevent your progress.
Can you get out of this gloomy dungeon? Progresses you will face more difficult obstacles, you have to be quick and use your intelligence.

Arrows, spears, flaming fireballs, electrical currents, ghosts. This dungeon everything has been designed to stop you. Smart and fast to be a fighter and not let obstacles stop you.

Random maps and endless progress, obstacles
6 different characters
Impressive sound
swipe control game play.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
